cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I shine in the day! What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very hot!
🌞 I help flowers grow.
💛 I am yellow.

cosmos.question: I come out at night, and I'm round and white. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Sometimes I'm full, sometimes I'm just a sliver.
🐺 Animals howl at me.
🧀 People sometimes say I'm made of cheese.

cosmos.question: I twinkle way up high, far beyond the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I'm small and sparkly.
🌃 You can see many of me at night.
🔭 People wish upon me.

cosmos.question: I am big and round, and you live on me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 I have land and water.
🏡 You have a home on me.
🌱 Trees and plants grow on me.

cosmos.question: I am a shape that the moon makes, sometimes round, sometimes like a banana. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 I change shape throughout the month.
🍌 Sometimes I look like a curved fruit.
🗓️ I follow a cycle

cosmos.question: I am a group of many stars that make a picture. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some of us look like animals.
✨ You need to connect the dots.
🌌 We are a pattern in the night sky.

cosmos.question: I go around the sun once every year, and because of me we have seasons. What am I?

hints.text: 🔄 I move in a circle.
🌡️ I help create seasons.
📅 It takes 365 days for me to orbit.

cosmos.question: I am a big group of stars and dust, and there are billions of us in the universe. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 I am very large.
🌌 Our sun is part of one.
🌀 We are spiral or elliptical.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of gas far away. I am like our sun, but smaller and dimmer from earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I give off light and heat.
🌟 I am made of plasma.
🔭 You need a telescope to see me well.

cosmos.question: I am a big, cold space with planets, stars, and galaxies. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 Rockets fly in me.
🌌 I am bigger than anything you can imagine.
⚫ I am mostly empty.

weather.question: I fall from the sky and make everything wet. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I come from clouds.
☔ You need an umbrella when I fall.
🌧️ Plants and animals need me to grow.

weather.question: I am big and yellow and hot. I make you feel warm. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I shine in the daytime.
😎 You might need sunglasses when I'm out.
🌻 Plants love me!

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I sometimes look like sheep.
☁️ I can be dark or light.
✈️ Airplanes fly through me.

weather.question: I am cold and white and fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of water.
🧣 You need warm clothes when I'm around.
⛄ You can build a snowman with me!

weather.question: I blow through the trees and make them dance. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can be gentle or strong.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.
🌬️ I move the leaves on the ground.

weather.question: After the rain, you might see me in the sky with many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.
✨ I am curved and beautiful.
🌦️ I appear when the sun shines through the rain.

weather.question: I am a big storm with lots of rain, strong wind, and sometimes lightning. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I can be scary.
⛈️ You should stay inside when I come.
☔ I bring lots and lots of rain!

weather.question: I am very tiny drops of water that float in the air and make it hard to see. What am I?

hints.text: 🌫️ I look like a cloud near the ground.
🚗 You need to drive slowly when I'm around.
👁️ Sometimes you can't see very far because of me.

weather.question: I am a frozen rain that falls from the sky like little balls of ice. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I can hurt if I hit you!
🌦️ I often come with thunderstorms.
⚽ I'm like tiny ice balls.

weather.question: I am bright light in the sky that comes with a thunderstorm. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I am very fast.
🌩️ I am often followed by thunder.
⚡I am a flash of electricity.
